price: The wicked will be known by their marks and will be seized by their forelocks and their feet.
arabic: يُعۡرَفُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ بِسِيمَٰهُمۡ فَيُؤۡخَذُ بِٱلنَّوَٰصِي وَٱلۡأَقۡدَامِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
